name: gromacs-helper-vscode
description: Complete language support for GROMACS molecular dynamics simulation files including MDP, TOP, GRO, NDX, PDB formats and PROPKA pKa results

gromacsHelper.disableWelcomeNotification.description: Disable welcome and update notifications / 禁用欢迎和更新通知

gromacsHelper.semanticHighlighting.enabl.description: Enable semantic highlighting for residues in GROMACS files

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_acidic.description: Color for acidic residues (ASP, GLU) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_basic.description: Color for basic residues (LYS, ARG, HIS) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_polar.description: Color for polar residues (SER, THR, CYS, ASN, GLN) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_nonpolar.description: Color for nonpolar residues (ALA, VAL, LEU, ILE, MET) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_aromatic.description: Color for aromatic residues (PHE, TYR, TRP) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_special.description: Color for special residues (PRO, GLY) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_nucleotide.description: Color for nucleotide bases - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_ion.description: Color for ions (NA, CL, K, MG, CA, ZN) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_water.description: Color for water molecules (SOL, WAT, HOH) - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.residue_other.description: Color for unknown or other residues - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.atom_name.description: Color for atom names - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.atom_index.description: Color for atom indices - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.coordinate.description: Color for coordinate values - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.chain_id.description: Color for chain identifiers - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_run_contr.description: Color for MDP run control parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_output_co.description: Color for MDP output control parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_neighbor_.description: Color for MDP neighbor searching parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_van_der_w.description: Color for MDP van der Waals parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_temperatu.description: Color for MDP temperature coupling parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_pressure_.description: Color for MDP pressure coupling parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_velocity_.description: Color for MDP velocity generation parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_energy_mi.description: Color for MDP energy minimization parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.mdp_param_free_ener.description: Color for MDP free energy parameters

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_keyword.description: Color for Packmol keywords - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_command.description: Color for Packmol commands - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_constraint.description: Color for Packmol constraint commands - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_geometry.description: Color for Packmol geometry commands - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_number.description: Color for Packmol numeric values - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_filename.description: Color for Packmol file names - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.colors.packmol_comment.description: Color for Packmol comments - must be a valid hex color code

gromacsHelper.packmolPreview.geometrySeg.description: Number of segments for geometry rendering in Packmol 3D preview

gromacsHelper.packmolPreview.structureOp.description: Opacity for structure rendering in Packmol 3D preview

gromacsHelper.packmolPreview.constraintO.description: Opacity for constraint rendering in Packmol 3D preview

gromacsHelper.packmolPreview.ambientLigh.description: Ambient light intensity in Packmol 3D preview

gromacsHelper.packmolPreview.directional.description: Directional light intensity in Packmol 3D preview

gromacsHelper.monitor.enabled.description: Enable GROMACS process monitoring in status bar

gromacsHelper.monitor.rotateInterval.description: Interval for rotating between merged monitor targets in milliseconds (default: 10000ms)

gromacsHelper.monitor.targets.description: Monitor target configurations (local or remote SSH)

id.description: Unique identifier for this monitor target

name.description: Display name for this monitor target

type.description: Monitor type: 'local' for local processes, 'remote' for SSH

independent.description: Show this monitor in a separate status bar item (default: false, merged with others)

sshHost.description: SSH host for remote monitoring (format: user@hostname)

sshKey.description: Path to SSH private key file (optional)

scriptPath.description: Path to monitor script on remote server (default: ~/.vscode/gromacs_monitor.sh)

gromacsHelper.commands.groups.description: GROMACS command groups with placeholder support. Placeholders: {ext} for file selection, {ext1|ext2} for multiple extensions, {output.ext} for output file input, {basename} for base name input.

explorer/context.when: resourceExtname == .pdb || resourceExtname == .gro || resourceExtname == .mol || resourceExtname == .mol2 || resourceExtname == .sdf || resourceExtname == .cif || resourceExtname == .xtc || resourceExtname == .trr

editor/title.when: resourceExtname == .pdb || resourceExtname == .gro || resourceExtname == .mol || resourceExtname == .mol2 || resourceExtname == .sdf || resourceExtname == .cif || resourceExtname == .xtc || resourceExtname == .trr

scripts.package: webpack --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map && webpack --config webpack.viewer.config.js --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
